content: >this pattern is available for downloading also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want option the english title of the pattern is **do never ever socks** >please note that the old pattern version for sport weight yarns has been removed and replaced by a revised and extended pattern for fingering weight yarns --- **pattern features ** - knitted cuff down - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - instructions written in metric and us terminology - four sizes small 60 sts medium 66 sts large 72 sts and extra-large 78 sts - charts but no written instructions for the twisted-stitch cable pattern 1 https //payhip com/b/zz71
